coverage inference penalty.from sentence:
3 . shows our main results on the CNN - DM corpus , with abstractive models shown in the top , and bottom - up attention methods at the bottom .
We first observe that using a coverage inference penalty scores the same as a full coverage mechanism , without requiring any additional model parameters or model fine - tuning .

no significant difference.between: Pointer - Generator and CopyTransformer with bottom - up attention

observe.from sentence: The results with the CopyTransformer and coverage penalty indicate a slight improvement across all three scores , but we observe no significant difference between Pointer - Generator and CopyTransformer with bottom - up attention .
